Reviews.Title: greatt!
Reviews.Author: carla m xx
Reviews.Content: This camera is a lovely little one that is great for everything I love it! Pics come out great would defo recommend,

Reviews.Title: Got here too late
Reviews.Author: Kim A.
Reviews.Content: I did not get it in time for the Christmas dinner so . I am returning it. I just got her one from Walmart, but I had to pay more for it! I will order again for my grandsons birthday

Reviews.Title: awful camera - don't waste your money
Reviews.Author: wendy
Reviews.Content: We got this camera as a prize at a party, so glad we didn't pay money for this piece of junk.  My daughter took it to camp with her and every picture she took was blurry.  I would never buy a camera from vivicam.  Its says its a 8 megapixel camera but my old 2 megapixel phone takes better pictures.

Reviews.Title: Caught forever
Reviews.Author: landshark2u
Reviews.Content: I haven't had much time to use this item so far so good the only issue that I have come across so far is that I am unable to set the current date

Reviews.Title: Good Price
Reviews.Author: Keisha C. Etienne "Keishae1"
Reviews.Content: I brought this item for my little cousin's in Hiati so I haven't opened it. The items were shipped extremetly afast and brand new. Thanks

ProductInfo.Features:
7.1-megapixel 1/4-inch CMOS
4x digital zoom
1.8-inch color TFT-LCD display
Digital image stabilizer
Uses 3 AAA batteries (Not Included)
ProductInfo.Name: Vivitar V7020-BLK Vivicam 7.1 Megapixel Digital Camera with 1.7-Inch LCD (Black)
